All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
AccelerationSystem
Accelerates entities by force.
ActionQueue
A collection of queued actions to apply to containing entities.
ActionStratDeferredConverterFactory
DeferredConverterFactory.ActionStrat for core actions.
ActionSystem
Dequeues and applies actions on entities.
Animation
A swappable animation.
AnimationSystem  
AudioEmitter
Emits a collection of audio clips at a given configuration.
AudioSystem
Starts and stops audio clips.
Bounds
Bounds defined by at least one of:
CappingSystem
Caps velocities of entities.
Chain
Maintains references to a single positional and multiple rotational anchors.
ChainSystem
Repositions chained entities.
CollisionSystem
Detects and handles entity collisions.
Damping
Damping applied on an entity.
DampingSystem
Applies damping to entity velocities.
EntitiesCollided
Event broadcast when entities collide.
Force
Net force acting on an entity.
ForceAction
Adds an amount to an entity's existing force component.
Graphic
A swappable visual representation.
Handler
Wraps a MultiStageAction and uses collections of input enums to arm it.
HandlerReader
Reads Handlers from configuration files.
Input
An entity controller which responds to keyboard and mouse input.
InputSystem
Applies actions using current player input.
Mass
Mass of an entity.
MovementSystem
Applies velocity to entity positions.
RenderSystem
Renders all game entities.
Spawner
Provides clones of entity templates between 2 radii around some position.
SpawnSystem
Spawns entity clones from spawner entities.
Transform
Position and orientation of an entity local to a parent transform.
TransformAction
Sets a transform.
Velocity
Velocity of a moving entity.
VelocityAction
Sets entity velocity.
VelocityCap
Maximum velocity of a moving entity.
